Sentencas: The stability of interfacial structure between air electrode and ceria-based electrolyte (Sm2O3-CeO2, SDC) was evaluated under various polarization conditions at 1,000 degrees C.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This is because the structural change at the interface is strongly related to the diffusion of constituent elements and has the potential to affect the long term stability.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, (La,Sr)MnO3 (LSM) and (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O-3 (LSCF) were applied as air electrodes.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The cell with LSM/SDC interface showed the performance enhancement after cathodic polarization for 5 h, accompanied with the change in interfacial structure.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The magnitude of the microstructural change as well as activation was dependent on the current density and the oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, the active triple phase boundary (TPB)-length decreased at every condition studied.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: On the other hand, no appreciable change in interfacial structure was confirmed for the LSCF/SDC system regardless of polarization conditions.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In response to this phenomenon, the total TPB-length was almost identical to the active one.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The difference in morphological evolution at the interface depending on the electrode material was discussed.
Titulo: Interfacial Stability between Air Electrode and Ceria-Based Electrolyte under Cathodic Polarization in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
